# idsec_cmgr_pool (Resource)

Connector manager pool resource, manages pool of SIA / system connectors.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "idsec_cmgr_pool" "example_pool" {
  name                 = "example_db_pool"
  description          = "A pool for example"
  assigned_network_ids = [var.network_id]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `assigned_network_ids` (List of String) Assigned networks to the pool
- `name` (String) Name of the pool to add

### Optional

- `components_count` (Map of Number) Count of components on the pool
- `created_at` (String) The creation time of the pool
- `description` (String) Pool description
- `identifiers_count` (Number) Count of identifiers on the pool
- `pool_id` (String) ID of the pool to update
- `updated_at` (String) The last update time of the pool
